means: 不赞成( disapprove的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The Prime Minister made it clear that he disapproved.
sentence.Network_cn: 首相明确表示他不赞成。

sentence.Network_en: 60 percent of the respondents said they disapproved of the president's performance.
sentence.Network_cn: 60％的调查对象表示不认可总统的表现。

sentence.Network_en: Her mother disapproved of her working in a pub.
sentence.Network_cn: 她母亲不赞成她在酒吧工作。

PerfectNetExp.abs: I care so much about how my peers look at me that I may abandon something I desire if it is disapproved by my friends or family .你在乎别人看你的眼光吗？会为了众人的反对放弃自己想要的东西或人吗？
in a recent Gallup poll , 51 % disapproved of his handling of federal spending .最近一次盖洛普民意测验中，51%的美国民众不赞同奥巴马的联邦财政政策。
disapproved遭到反对的 unapproved未经同意或批准的 discovered被发现的 uncovered无掩护的;无掩盖物的 discoloured变了色或腿了色的 uncoloured未染色的;未加色彩的.
She disapproved of a fashion in dress ., 她不喜欢这种服装的式样.

list.abs: her mother disapproves of her wearing underwear ., 她母亲不赞成她穿透明的内衣.
高考前重点词语复习010|高考英语词汇 ... with sympathy 同情地 with disapproval 不满地 with fear 害怕地.
her parents disapprove of her marriage ., 她父母不赞成她的婚姻.
her parents disapprove of her going to dances alone ., 他父母不同意她独自去跳舞.
social disadvantaged 社会条件不利的social disapproval 社会的指责social disaster 社会灾祸

entry.def: If you disapprove of something or someone, you feel or show that you do not like them or do not approve of them.

example.ex: Most people disapprove of such violent tactics...
example.tran: 多数人反对这种暴力的手段。

example.ex: Her mother disapproved of her working in a pub...
example.tran: 她母亲不赞成她在酒吧工作。

auth_sentence.content: That she despised, as well as disapproved of.
auth_sentence.res_content: That she despised, as well as disapproved of.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That she despised, as well as disapproved of.

auth_sentence.content: His sport was disapproved of...as frivolous and ungodly.
auth_sentence.res_content: His sport was disapproved of...as frivolous and ungodly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His sport was disapproved of...as frivolous and ungodly.

auth_sentence.content: Each person has their own sets of things approved or disapproved.
auth_sentence.res_content: Each person has their own sets of things approved or disapproved.
